messages.content: Dear Elector; Like most MPs, I have worked hard for the disadvantaged, for better healthcare, schools, roads, police, etc. But the difference between the Conservatives and the others, is that we make sure the economy is working, so the money is there. In 2010, the UK was in crisis. Now: -the fastest growth in the EU; -falling unemployment; -the deficit cut by 1/3; - and 2.7 million paying lower tax. Perhaps you are nor a regular Conservative voter? But can you afford a return to rising trot, and uncertainty again? Best wishes, Yours, [signature]

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Touting the fastest growth in the EU.
States that 2.7 million paying lower tax.

issues.economy: In 2010, the UK was in crisis. Now there's the fastest growth in the EU, falling unemployment, the deficit cut by 1/3, and 2.7 million paying lower tax.

contactInformation.address: Jim Musk, on behalf of Bernard Jenkin, all at Unit C2 East Gores Farm, Salmons Lane, Colchester, CO6 1RZ. Printed by Printwrite, 2 Stepfield, Witham, CM8 3BN
